name: HP Terms and conditions
terms:
You will procure subject Warranty Extension AMC and register them with
HP in our name. After successful registration of AMC and updation of
warranty entitlement of our servers in HP records, you shall provide us
the original registration certificates as a proof of warranty extension.

You would provide us your adequate assistance in getting the support
from HP, if required during the entire warranty period

Quarterly advance net 30 days credit.
title: HP Terms and conditions

name: Kolkata Pant PO Terms
terms:
Term and Conditions:-
  1. Goods to be delivered at our factory in Kolkata as per address given above unless specified.
  2. Preferably goods receivable between 10.00 A.M. to 5.00 P.M. on all working days.
  3. The above delivery schedule is tentative and is subject to change without notice.
  4. The confirmation copy of this order may please be duly stamped signed and return to us as your acceptance of the order.
title: Kolkata Pant PO Terms

name: PO Terms Kolkata Plant
terms:
Dispatch Instruction :
1 Price Basic : F.O.R. Kolkata Factory
2 Tolerance applicable (+),(-) 5% on each Items.
3 Goods receivable on between 10.00 A.M. and 3.00 P.M. on working days
4 Goods not supplied during the month will not be carried forward to next month unless advised specifically by us
5 Supplies requested in one month should be completed by 25th of the month. No supplies will be received between 26 to 30th of the month.
6 The above delivery schedule is tentative and is subject to change without notice.
7 Taxes Charged need to be deposited timely and any input tax credit mismatch will be recovered
title: PO Terms Kolkata Plant
